participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and laid-back, enjoys outdoor activities and is quite practical.
participant_1.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i don't drink alcohol. i hate the color pink.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and sociable, loves to share experiences with friends and has a passion for music.
participant_2.background: my favorite singer is taylor swift. i love eating out with friends. i'm getting married in the spring. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i'm 24 years old.

content.text: I am sure you are a good person.
Yeah, i think it is. I am a very experienced person.
